summary:
Sick of Imperials not having a speech bonus?! Bretons not having Enhanced magicka!
Well I say no more! This mod makes an effort to Morrowindize the Racial skill bonusses and resistances.
descriptionHtml:
===============
Important note:
===============
Use Morrowindized Racial Skill Bonusses Resistances and Powers esp(v1.1), unless you\'re going to report bugs and fixes. Newest version has a bug that gives problems with speaking to Nord NPC\'s!  Or you can use the Oblivionized mod wich doesn\'t have any problems.

============
Description:
============
Sick of Imperials not having a speech bonus?! Bretons not having Enhanced magicka!
Well I say no more! This mod makes an effort to Morrowindize the Racial skill bonusses and resistances.

=================
What have I done:
=================
- I have recreated all Racial Skill Bonusses.
- I added Racial weaknesses and resistances.
- Added an optional file that changes the Nords base height.
- Replaced Skyrim\'s Racial Powers with Morrowindized ones.

===========================
Frequently asked questions:
===========================
Q. Do I need to start a new character?
A. No, the Racial resistances, weaknesses and bonusses all work!

============================
All Mods from this auther:
============================
- Oblivionized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8215
- Morrowindized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8670
- Morrowindized Artifacts:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8991
- Caucasian Yokudans aka Greyguards
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16309

===========
Remember:
===========
- Feedback! A mod is only as good as it\'s feedback!
- Put tags on the file that I might have missed. (this will make the file easier to find for others)
- If you like it, Endorse it. (this will tell other people that it is a good mod and it\'s a compliment to me)
- If you love it, Vote for it. (this will tell other people that this is either almost essential or at least something brilliant)

============================================
New Racial Abilities, Powers and Skill Bonusses:
============================================
Altmer(High Elf):
Racial Abilitiy:
- Highborn (+150 Magicka)
- High Elf Elemental Weakness (25% weakness to Fire, Frost, Shock and 50% weakness to magic)
- High Elf Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Destruction +10
- Alteration +5
- Conjuration +5
- Illusion +5
- Alchemy +5
- Enchanting +5

Argonian:
Racial Ability:
- Argonian Poison Immunity (100% Poison resistance)
- Argonian Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)
- Waterbreathing

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Light Armor +10
- Illusion +10
- Two handed (used to be Spear) +5
- Alteration +5
- Alchemy +5

Bosmer(Wood Elf):
Racial Ability:
- Wood Elf Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)
- Beast Tongue (Command Animal 600 sec)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Archery +15
- Sneak +10
- Light Armor +5
- Alchemy +5

Breton:
Racial Ability:
- Enhanced Magicka (+25 Magicka)
- Breton Magic Resistance (50% Magic resistance)
- Dragonskin (Dragonhide 60 sec)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Conjuration +10
- Alteration +10
- Restoration +5
- Illusion +5
- Alchemy +5

Dunmer(Dark Elf):
Racial Ability:
- Dark Elf Fire Resistance (75% Fire resistance)
- Ancestors wrath (unchanges, Ancestor guardian will be in a future update)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Destruction +10
- One-handed +10
- Archery +5
- Light Armor +5
- Alteration +5

Imperial:
Racial Ability:
- Voice of the Emperor (Fortify Speech 30, 30 sec)
- Star of the West (Absorb Stamina 200)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Speech +15
- One-handed +10
- Light Armor +5
- Two-handed +5

Kajiit:
Racial Ability:
- Claws (Unarmed damage +15)
- Eye of night (Nighteye 60 sec)
- Eye of Fear (Fear 30 sec)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Sneak +10
- Lockpicking +10
- Pickpocket +5
- Light Armor +5
- One-handed +5

Nord:
Racial Ability:
- Nord Frost Resistance (100% Frost resistance)
- Nord Shock Resistance (50% Shock resistance)
- Thunderfist (25 Shock damage)
- Woad (Ebonflesh 60 sec)

Reverted powers in version 1.2

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Two-handed +15
- One-handed +10
- Heavy armor +10

Orsimer(Orc):
Racial Ability:
- Orc Magic Resistance (25% Magic resistance)
- Beserk (unchanged, because it\'s perfect)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Block +10
- Smithing +10
- Heavy Armor + 10
- One-handed +5

Redguard:
Racial Ability:
- Redguard Resistance (75% Disease and Poison resistance)
- Adrenaline Rush (unchanged)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- One-handed +15
- Two-handed +10
- Heavy Armor +5
- Light Armor +5


===============
Version history:
===============
1.2
High Elves highborn gives them 150 extra magicka instead of the old 100.
Fixed Argonian poison resistance description.
Added and changed all Vampire Racial skill bonusses and abilities.
Undid power changes on Nords to hope fix the Nord speaking problem.

1.1:
Replaced all Skyrim Racial Powers with Morrowindized ones, 
except for Ancestor Guardian(future update) and Adrenaline Rush(future update).

1.0:
All racial skill bonusses and resistances Oblivionized. 
Origanal Skyrim racial Powers are unchanged.

==================
Recommended mods:
==================
If you like like this mod the i highly recommend:
- Ancient Spells - Morrowind and Oblivion Spells
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9153

==============
Special Thanks:
==============
QuitWhistler: Logo design
EvilPhoenix: Testing
author: coenve
